results.title: SBI Holdings targets majority stake in Singapore crypto exchange Coinhako
results.description: Japan’s SBI Holdings has signed a letter of intent to buy a controlling stake in Singapore-licensed crypto exchange Coinhako.

results.title: Stablecoins gain ground for paychecks and daily spending: BVNK report
results.description: A global survey of 4,658 crypto users found 39% receive income in stablecoins and 27% use them for payments, with stronger adoption in emerging markets.

results.title: Steak 'n Shake Says Bitcoin Has Lifted Sales 'Dramatically' in 9 Months
results.description: The fast-food chain says bitcoin payments have boosted sales, as it channels crypto receipts into a growing corporate reserve.

results.title: Polygon daily fees flip Ethereum amid prediction market boom
results.description: Polygon briefly surpassed Ethereum in daily fees as Polymarket activity surged, highlighting shifting user demand toward Layer-2 networks.

results.title: DeFi lender ZeroLend shuts down, blames illiquid chains
results.description: ZeroLend founder “Ryker” says several blockchains the lending protocol operates on are now “inactive,” leading to periods where it has operated at a loss.

results.title: Kraken Backs 'Trump Accounts' for Wyoming Newborns
results.description: The move reflects a broader effort by crypto firms to lock in regulatory goodwill through long-term political and geographic alignment.

results.title: Crypto sentiment hits extreme fear as Matrixport flags possible bottom
results.description: With Bitcoin sentiment at four-year lows, analysts have flagged historic oversold signals and potential seller exhaustion.

results.title: Bitcoin’s Long-Term Holders Show Signs of Strain After February Sell-Off
results.description: Bitcoin's long-term holders show weakening accumulation, with on-chain data pointing to $54,000 as the next support if $65,000 breaks.

results.title: Kraken sponsors Trump Accounts in Wyoming, citing crypto alignment
results.description: The Wyoming-based crypto exchange said it wanted to give back to the state it calls home, which it chose for its “responsible” approach to crypto regulation.

results.title: Crypto.com receives ISO/IEC 42001 AI certification as it expands its AI business
results.description: Crypto.com is expanding AI services as one of its three core business lines, amid broader industry adoption of the technology.

results.title: Crypto phishers are sending letters to Trezor, Ledger users again
results.description: It's not the first time scammers have used snail mail to target victims of hardware wallet company data breaches from years ago.

results.title: Philippines' Digital Bank Maya Looks to US Market for Up to $1B IPO
results.description: A U.S. venue could offer deeper capital access as investors weigh the bank’s regulated crypto business against its core banking operations.

results.title: Logan Paul sells Pokémon card for $16.5M, years after fractional NFT row
results.description: Paul once fractionalized ownership of the rare Pokémon card on Liquid Marketplace in 2022 before the website went offline, leading to a lawsuit as investors demanded returns.

results.title: Germany‘s central bank president touts stablecoin and CBDC benefits for EU
results.description: Joachim Nagel said euro-pegged stablecoins would offer the bloc more independence from US dollar-pegged coins soon to be allowed under the GENIUS Act.

results.title: Crypto Trading Isn’t Coming to Elon Musk's X (Yet), Says Product Head
results.description: The company’s “Smart Cashtag” feature is aimed at crypto enthusiasts, but the platform won't facilitate trades directly.

results.title: Bitcoin on Pace for Longest Losing Streak Since 2018 Bear Market
results.description: The selling simply won't stop. If February closes red, Bitcoin will register five consecutive red months, the longest streak in seven years.

results.title: Metaplanet Reports $619 Million Loss as Bitcoin Holdings Take Hit
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Metaplanet Reports $619 Million Loss as Bitcoin Holdings Take Hit Tokyo-based bitcoin treasury firm Metaplanet reported a fiscal 2025 net loss of 95 billion yen ($619 million), largely due to a 102.2 billion yen ($666 million) drop in the value of its bitcoin holdings. This post Metaplanet Reports $619 Million Loss as Bitcoin Holdings Take Hit first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Bitcoin Bears Dominate: Failure to Break $71,800 Keeps Downside Risk Alive
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Bitcoin Bears Dominate: Failure to Break $71,800 Keeps Downside Risk Alive Key levels in focus: $65,650 support holds for now, but break below opens $63,000 then Fibonacci $57,800; resistance caps upside at $71,800–$74,500. This post Bitcoin Bears Dominate: Failure to Break $71,800 Keeps Downside Risk Alive first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Ethan Greene - Feral Analysis and Juan Galt.

results.title: Vitalik Buterin: Hedging on Prediction Markets Could 'Replace Fiat Currency'
results.description: The Ethereum co-founder argues that prediction markets’ current focus on short-term crypto bets is putting them on a path to ‘corposlop.’

results.title: Metaplanet Posts $605 Million Loss After Spending Billions on Bitcoin
results.description: The firm signaled that it’s embracing preferred shares.

results.title: Payjoin Foundation Gains 501(c)(3) Status, Enabling Tax-Deductible Donations for Bitcoin Privacy Development
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Payjoin Foundation Gains 501(c)(3) Status, Enabling Tax-Deductible Donations for Bitcoin Privacy Development Payjoin Foundation, the nonprofit behind the Payjoin Dev Kit, has secured 501(c)(3) status from the IRS, making U.S. donations tax-deductible and accelerating development of privacy-enhancing Bitcoin protocols. results.title: Bitcoin 'Boom-Bust' Era Is Over as Institutions Take the Lead: WisdomTree
results.description: Crypto's adolescence is over—and institutional capital is changing the rules of engagement, says WisdomTree's latest market analysis.

results.title: Harvard Cuts Bitcoin ETF Stake, Adds Ethereum Exposure in Q4 Filing
results.description: Harvard Management Company trimmed its Bitcoin ETF position while starting a new stake in a spot Ethereum fund.

results.title: Trump Family-Backed American Bitcoin Keeps Stacking Bitcoin, Holdings Pass 6,000 BTC

results.title: Harvard Trims Bitcoin Position by 21% in Q4 Portfolio Shift
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Harvard Trims Bitcoin Position by 21% in Q4 Portfolio Shift Harvard trimmed its Bitcoin holdings by 21% in the fourth quarter while establishing its first-ever position in Ethereum. results.title: Bitcoin Price Reclaims $70,000 After Deep February Slide
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Bitcoin Price Reclaims $70,000 After Deep February Slide After a rough sell-off that dragged BTC near $60,000, the bitcoin price has rebounded above $70,000. This post Bitcoin Price Reclaims $70,000 After Deep February Slide first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: How Silent.Link Solves SIM-Swap Risks and Roaming Hassles for Traveling Bitcoiners
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine How Silent.Link Solves SIM-Swap Risks and Roaming Hassles for Traveling Bitcoiners Silent.Link eliminates SIM-swap attacks via eSIM backup codes and automates seamless roaming across 160+ countries, bypassing censorship like China's Great Firewall. This post How Silent.Link Solves SIM-Swap Risks and Roaming Hassles for Traveling Bitcoiners first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Juan Galt.

results.title: Coinbase (COIN) Surges 18%, Strategy (MSTR) Jumps 10% as Crypto Stocks Jump
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Coinbase (COIN) Surges 18%, Strategy (MSTR) Jumps 10% as Crypto Stocks Jump Crypto-linked stocks jumped as Coinbase (COIN) surged 18% and Strategy (MSTR) rose 10%, fueled by a rebound in Bitcoin and renewed investor interest in digital-asset exposure. This post Coinbase (COIN) Surges 18%, Strategy (MSTR) Jumps 10% as Crypto Stocks Jump first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: White House Executive Director: Trillions Are Waiting To Enter Bitcoin And Crypto, Working Hard on Market Structure Bill
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine White House Executive Director: Trillions Are Waiting To Enter Bitcoin And Crypto, Working Hard on Market Structure Bill The White House executive director said trillions are poised to enter Bitcoin and crypto, emphasizing ongoing work on a market structure bill. results.title: Brazil Proposes National Bitcoin Reserve, Targets 1 Million BTC Over Five Years
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Brazil Proposes National Bitcoin Reserve, Targets 1 Million BTC Over Five Years Brazilian lawmakers have reintroduced a bill proposing the creation of a Strategic Sovereign Bitcoin Reserve (RESBit) to acquire one million Bitcoin over five years. This post Brazil Proposes National Bitcoin Reserve, Targets 1 Million BTC Over Five Years first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.
